name: Safelist_removeAttributesTest
description: Unit tests for the removeAttributes method in the Safelist class.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_SingleTag
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of a single attribute from a specific tag.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_AllTags
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of an attribute from all tags.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_TagNotAllowed
test_cases.description: Tests the removal of an attribute from a tag that is not allowed.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_NoAttributesSupplied
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when no attributes are supplied for removal.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_EmptyTag
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when an empty tag is supplied for attribute removal.

test_cases.name: testRemoveAttributes_NullAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when null attributes are supplied for removal.
